comment: The Alexander Subbase Theorem: a space is compact iff it has a subbase such that any cover taken from the subbase has a finite subcover. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 24-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
